named-query.name: findMoviesByDate
named-query.query: from Movie m where m.released between :startDate and :endDate

named-query.name: findMoviesByTitle
named-query.query: from Movie m where lower(m.title) like '%'||:title||'%' order by m.title

named-query.name: findAllMovies
named-query.query: from Movie m order by m.title

named-query.name: findAllDirectors
named-query.query: from Director d order by d.name
